title: Dungeons and Downloads
description: All Arthur wants is to play his favorite computer game with his big sister, Selena. But Selena has been playing for a long time and Arthur just can't seem to reach her level. Desperate to level up quickly, Arthur decides to turn to the Internet for help. In Dungeons and Downloads, Arthur learns a valuable lesson in digital literacy. Students will have the opportunity to analyze the plot as well as use commas to separate dialogue.
highFrequencyWords: browser, coincidence, dungeon, equipment, launched, legitimate, mature, modify, noob, rebooting, suspicious, virus
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Commas                : Recognize and use commas to separate dialogue
phonics:
